Key Match Events: Portland trailed 99-86 with 6:13 to play, but made a 14-4 run.
James and Christie combined for 11 points down the stretch, capped by James' seventh 3-pointer with 59 seconds left.
Post-Match Reflections: The Lakers have won six of eight, and have beaten Portland for the fifth straight time.
Miscellaneous Highlights: LeBron James hit a season-high seven 3-pointers.
Max Christie had a career-high 28 points.
Others: Anfernee Simons scored 11 of his 23 points in the fourth quarter for the Blazers.
The Blazers have lost four of six, while the Lakers have won six of eight.
